content: Martin Jaggi — People - EPFL Martin Jaggi Edit profile martin.jaggi@epfl.ch +41 21 693 70 59 http://mlo.epfl.ch Google Scholar ID Group Webpage: mlo.epfl.ch Associate Professor, Machine Learning and Optimization Laboratory EPFL IC IINFCOM MLO INJ 341 (Bâtiment INJ) Station 14 1015 Lausanne +41 21 693 70 59 Office: INJ 341 EPFL > IC > IINFCOM > MLO Associate Professor, SIN - Teaching EPFL > IC > IC-SIN > SIN-ENS Web site: Web site: https://sin.epfl.ch Associate Professor, SSC - Teaching EPFL > IC > IC-SSC > SSC-ENS Web site: Web site: https://ssc.epfl.ch Associate Professor, EDIC - Teaching EPFL > VPA-AVP-DLE > AVP-DLE-EDOC > EDIC-ENS Academic Director, RCP - Administration EPFL > VPA-AVP-CP > RCP > RCP-GE vCard Données administratives Fields of expertise Machine Learning, Optimization Biography Martin Jaggi is an Associate Professor at EPFL, heading the Machine Learning and Optimization Laboratory. Before that, he was a post-doctoral researcher at ETH Zurich, at the Simons Institute in Berkeley, and at École Polytechnique in Paris. He has earned his PhD in Machine Learning and Optimization from ETH Zurich in 2011, and a MSc in Mathematics also from ETH Zurich.
